metadata.title: CVE-2016-6802 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache Shiro before 1.3.2 allows attackers to bypass intended servletfilters and gain access by leveraging use of a non-root servlet contextpath.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libshiro-java - 1.3.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shiro package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-2').
